title: Save the Krab
body:
http://i.imgur.com/9MJ6wCL.png

Since everyone is talking about the new pool party skins... i want to point out that Fiora BRUTALLY KICKS an INNOCENT crab that only wanted to play with her.

Gods... that is HEARTLESS... Even Dark Star Thresh, an evil creature that wants to destoy the universe, doesnt hurt animals on purpose... in fact, he wanted to be friend of that little frog... 

But Fiora? SHE IS A MONSTER.

https://youtu.be/06bRP9ThcFs?t=7

Just LOOK AT HER, she kicks Kelly with HATE and FURY after disarming the poor little guy. 

... Is that a good example of the demacian ideals? I DONT THINK SO.

Please, think about Kelly

replies.body:
_The beach shakes as Skarner burrows up from beneath the sands._

{{champion:72}} _"I heard someone was bringing harm to an innocent arthropod."_

{{champion:72}} *"So? Who was it?"*

{{champion:44}} *pointing at fiora* "It was her!"

{{champion:117}} "Yeah! Get her!"

{{champion:114}} "What? It wasn't me! It was.. uh.. ZIGGS!"

{{champion:115}} "Shes lying! Lying! Get her!"

{{champion:72}} *"Feel my sting!"*

{{champion:114}} "AH!"

*Skarner engages in a wild goose chase, running around the beach after Fiora while the Benny Hills theme plays in the backround.*

{{champion:72}} *ULTS* "HAHA, GOT Y-"
{{champion:114}} *Parries*
{{champion:72}} "...really?"
{{champion:114}} *Kicks Skarner in the face*
Giant Enemy Crab-{{champion:6}} "U WOT M8"
I imagined the benny hill song playing during that chase
YES

Freaking Fiora. xD 

Let's call P.E.T.A. Poor crab. :'( 

I'll adopt Kelly <3 

CHEERS FOR KELLY !!!!
{{champion:77}}: If P.E.T.A asks, this fur is fake >.>
PETA will kill the crab
Incoming Lobster Skarner skin with a special interaction towards Pool Party Fiora.
Demacia can be a harsh place.

... Why? D:

I got so happy when I saw the little crab appear THEN FEDORA KICKS IT AWAY WITH MY HOPES AND DREAMS.

Riot pls. Fix. :c
He mocked her tho...

>
> He mocked her tho...

BUT SHE BRUTALLY KICKED KELLY
#SHE KICKED KELLY
Yeah but he started it
She shouldn't be holding an EXTREMELY DANGEROUS LIFE-THREATENING POOL NOODLE all the time then. ;3;
I bet they didn't even ask her name. WE NEED NOODLE CONTROL AMERICA
I WILL FIGHT FOR MY RIGHTS TO UTILIZE POOL NOODLES!!!
Yeah i agree, ban pool noodles pls.

> [{quoted}](name=The Pumpkin Kinq,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=iEogbjd5,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-06-28T17:43:48.695+0000)
>
> He mocked her tho...

I wonder what the reaction would be if it was a cat or kitten instead of a crab. LOL
It'd be different, everyone knows women loves kittens.

> [{quoted}](name=The Pumpkin Kinq,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=iEogbjd5,comment-id=000400010000,timestamp=2016-07-01T09:09:15.979+0000)
>
> It'd be different, everyone knows women loves kittens.

I mean outrage of animal abuse lol, then how about if it was a hamster then or a rabbit, lol
Crabs are people too riot.
Yeah!  Just look at Crabgot!
Animal abuse, HOLY CRAB!
{{champion:6}} "LITTLE BROTHERRRRRR!"

I can't think of the crab because Fiora's noodle rapier squeaks when she uses her E.
I think that's the best sound i heard lol <3
Her ult balloons also squeak when they pop :D

Almost the same adorable sound when Surprise Party Fiddlesticks throws his E and his balloon animal squeaks when it bounces to targets :D
Seriously tho, why does she kick the crab so hard into oblivion?
Have you seen an armed crab before? http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/6a1V51Oq-everyone-is-up-in-arms-about-fiora-kicking-a-crab

Considering Demacia is basically a tyrannous city-state I see this as completely appropriate. Especially since Fiora herself is of noble Demacian blood.

Hell, Noxus has a TYRANT and yet their structure is far less tyrannous. Most of the residents are pretty free to do as they wish.
We needed a pool party yi with that noodle D=

> [{quoted}](name=BlkGolem,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=iEogbjd5,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-06-28T17:58:29.869+0000)
>
> We needed a pool party yi with that noodle D=

pool party yi/fiora vs kat/darius or ashe/trynda
Accurate representation of Figueroa (good job spellcheck!) and every single Academician (Again gj spellcheck) champ in game.
Accurate representation of Fiora though.
"she kicks **KELLY** with HATE and FURY after disarming the poor little** GUY**"
Kelly is transgender.

> [{quoted}](name=BloodyTompon,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=iEogbjd5,comment-id=000b0000,timestamp=2016-07-01T07:24:36.568+0000)
>
> Kelly is transgender.

wtf does that mean!?
So I was not the only one who noticed this. It feels bad watching little crab getting kicked in the face after losing a duel. Isn't Fiora supposed to be honorable? Not cool!

> [{quoted}](name=He4rtkiller,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=iEogbjd5,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2016-06-29T08:54:24.679+0000)
>
> So I was not the only one who noticed this. It feels bad watching little crab getting kicked in the face after losing a duel. Isn't Fiora supposed to be honorable? Not cool!

Fiora was written to be a cocky jackass with unrivaled fencing skills. Humble is not in her dictionary.

> [{quoted}](name=Tanukihero,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=iEogbjd5,comment-id=000f0000,timestamp=2016-06-30T07:43:08.203+0000)
>
> Fiora was written to be a cocky jackass with unrivaled fencing skills. Humble is not in her dictionary.

Have to disagree with you on the cocky jackass statement. Fiora is a strong and confident character and she is a very skilled duelist but she cares about honor a great deal. She strives to bring honor back to her family and wouldn't do anything reckless that could bring them shame. She is not happy about killing and she even gives her opponents a way to forfeit the duel and save themselves with a minor punishment (compared to death). Even when her opponents disrespect her she doesn't show any disrespect towards them till their last breath. So she is really strong and cool but not cocky at all. This is my understanding of Fiora and her lore.

> [{quoted}](name=He4rtkiller,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=iEogbjd5,comment-id=000f00000000,timestamp=2016-07-01T10:13:48.012+0000)
>
> Have to disagree with you on the cocky jackass statement. Fiora is a strong and confident character and she is a very skilled duelist but she cares about honor a great deal. She strives to bring honor back to her family and wouldn't do anything reckless that could bring them shame. She is not happy about killing and she even gives her opponents a way to forfeit the duel and save themselves with a minor punishment (compared to death). Even when her opponents disrespect her she doesn't show any disrespect towards them till their last breath. So she is really strong and cool but not cocky at all. This is my understanding of Fiora and her lore.

I forgotten they gave her a new lore. The older lore kinda made look like a female draven.

She strives to bring honor back to her family and wouldn't do anything reckless that could bring them shame. She is not happy about killing and she even gives her opponents a way to forfeit the duel and save themselves with a minor punishment (compared to death). Even when her opponents disrespect her she doesn't show any disrespect towards them till their last breath. So she is really strong and cool but not cocky at all. then why she kick the crab?

> [{quoted}](name=TenshouSNK,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=iEogbjd5,comment-id=000f000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-01T11:15:58.105+0000)
>
> then why she kick the crab?

Maybe the skin is supposed to represent another side of Fiora's personality or how would her personality develop growing up under different circumstances. Maybe the crab did something bad to Fiora that we don't know and she kicked it for revenge. Either way it's not cool. I would rather see her handshaking with the crab after defeating it saying "gg wp".

> [{quoted}](name=He4rtkiller,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=iEogbjd5,comment-id=000f0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-01T12:30:03.502+0000)

Maybe the crab did something bad to Fiora that we don't know and she kicked it for revenge. I would rather see her handshaking with the crab after defeating it saying "gg wp".

it should have been a hamster
What were you expecting from someone with that hair...

Okay that as actually kind of brutal, and here i play Darius on a daily basis.

I must be severely damaged to not be bothered by chopping up to five sentient characters in half in a row, not by spilling blood all over the summoner's rift

but i'm disturbed when i see one (disarmed) animal being kicked in the face.

Its both cute and awful at the same time.

Then again i guess she let it off easily, considering what she normally does to her ~~pincusions~~ opponents!

Maybe kicking Kelly is a metaphor for her making herself clean and pretty so she can hit on all the hotties #cough#TryndamereGarenDarius#cough# and have those wild crazy nights with the DND sign on the door without freaking out the hotty...

http://www.hercampus.com/sites/default/files/2014/04/16/dwightwide.jpg

Wrong. Demacia's cast system proves that only the highborn and noble by blood have a shot at being someone. Fiora kicking this poor, low-cast crab only shows the true face of ~~North Korea~~ Demacia.
Crabs are assholes

She will know fear
